#Experiment 1
votemodel1m = lm(vote ~ cond*gender*male_stereotype, data = subset(dataframe, experiment == 1))
summary(votemodel1m)

votemodel1f = lm(vote ~ cond*gender*female_stereotype, data = subset(dataframe, experiment == 1))
summary(votemodel1f)
